alert.note: Alert for Taliaferro; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 12:00PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Little River near Washington affecting Wilkes and Taliaferro Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Little River near Washington. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 25 feet, Moderate flooding occurs in the woodlands and fields along the river upstream and downstream from the gage at Lundberg Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 26 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM EDT Thursday was 26 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 19 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 26.4 feet on 02/07/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
